        public static java.lang.String insert(java.lang.String nameTable,
                                      java.lang.String[] columns,
                                      java.lang.Object[] values,
                                      int[] types)
        Method to create a string query SQL for insert into operation.
        Parameters:
        nameTable - string name of the table.
        columns - arrays of string of the columns names.
        values - arrays of object of the values of the columns.
        types - arrays of int of the type of the values of the columns.
        Returns:
        string query SQL for the insert into operation.

      • insert

        public static java.lang.String insert(java.lang.String nameTable,
                                      java.lang.String[] columns,
                                      java.lang.Object[] values,
                                      int[] types,
                                      boolean preparedStatement)
        Method to create a string query SQL for insert into operation.
        Parameters:
        nameTable - string name of the table.
        columns - arrays of string of the columns names.
        values - arrays of object of the values of the columns.
        types - arrays of int of the type of the values of the columns.
        preparedStatement - if true print all value with the symbol "?".
        Returns:
        string query SQL for the insert into operation.

        Method to fetch the result of a query .
        Parameters:
        sql - the String SQL.
        Returns:
        the Result of the Query.

      • executeAndFetchQuery

        public static org.jooq.Result<org.jooq.Record> executeAndFetchQuery(java.lang.String sql)
                                                             throws java.sql.SQLException
        Method to execute and fetch the result of a query .
        Parameters:
        sql - the String SQL.
        Returns:
        the Result of the Query.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if the query SQL is wrong.

      • getMySQLConnection

        public static org.jooq.DSLContext getMySQLConnection(java.lang.String host,
                                                     java.lang.String port,
                                                     java.lang.String database,
                                                     java.lang.String username,
                                                     java.lang.String password)
        Method utility for get a MySQL connection with JOOQ.
        Parameters:
        host - host where the server is.
        port - number of the port of the server.
        database - string name of the database.
        username - string username.
        password - string password.
        Returns:
        the DSLContext set with Connection.
